Flow.description: Sends out scheduled Surveys to Customer after Case got closed /CRMT-3607

value.stringValue: AND( [Case].No_Survey__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , "Closed"), NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactId)), NOT([Case].SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , NOT(BEGINS(TEXT([Case].Onboarding_Type__c), "Resmio") ), [Case].RecordTypeId = "01258000000FAvxAAG" /* Onboarding */ )

AND( [Case].No_Survey__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , "Closed"), NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactId)), NOT([Case].SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , NOT(BEGINS(TEXT([Case].Onboarding_Type__c), "Resmio") ), [Case].RecordTypeId = "01258000000FAvxAAG" /* Onboarding */ )

AND( [Case].No_Survey__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , "Closed"), NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactId)), NOT([Case].SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , OR( [Case].RecordTypeId = "01258000000FAvsAAG" , /* General Case */ [Case].RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBaHAAW" , /* Issue Damage */ [Case].RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBa7AAG" , /* Issue Data */ [Case].RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBa2AAG" , /* Issue Invoicing */ [Case].RecordTypeId = "01258000000VX2kAAG" , /* Issue Pay */ [Case].RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBaMAAW", /* Issue Tech */ AND( [Case].RecordTypeId = "01258000000FAvxAAG", /* Onboarding */ BEGINS(TEXT([Case].Onboarding_Type__c), "Resmio") ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_6
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.No_Survey__c} = FALSE, ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} , "Closed"), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.ContactId})), NOT({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail} = "noreply@orderbird.com") , OR( {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FAvsAAG" , /* General Case */ {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FBaHAAW" , /* Issue Damage */ {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FBa7AAG" , /* Issue Data */ {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FBa2AAG" , /* Issue Invoicing */ {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000VX2kAAG" , /* Issue Pay */ {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FBaMAAW", /* Issue Tech */ AND( {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FAvxAAG", /* Onboarding */ BEGINS(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Onboarding_Type__c}), "Resmio") ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_6_pmetrule
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_old.No_Survey__c} = FALSE, ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Status} , "Closed"), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_old.ContactId})), NOT({!myVariable_old.SuppliedEmail} = "noreply@orderbird.com") , OR( {!myVariable_old.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FAvsAAG" , /* General Case */ {!myVariable_old.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FBaHAAW" , /* Issue Damage */ {!myVariable_old.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FBa7AAG" , /* Issue Data */ {!myVariable_old.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FBa2AAG" , /* Issue Invoicing */ {!myVariable_old.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000VX2kAAG" , /* Issue Pay */ {!myVariable_old.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FBaMAAW", /* Issue Tech */ AND( {!myVariable_old.RecordTypeId} = "01258000000FAvxAAG", /* Onboarding */ BEGINS(TEXT({!myVariable_old.Onboarding_Type__c}), "Resmio") ) ) )
